name: Introduction to Public Law
description: Introduces students to the fundamentals of public law in the United States, including the legal system, constitutional law, administrative law, and civil rights.

name: Public Law & Politics
description: Explores the relationship between public law and politics, examining how public law shapes and is shaped by political interests.

name: Public Law Theory & Practice
description: Explores the theoretical foundations of public law and the practical applications of those theories.

name: Advanced Public Law
description: An exploration of the more complex aspects of public law, including international law, civil rights, and public policy.
